commit.message:
p2p, refactor: remove unneeded CNetAddr::UnserializeV1Array()

which is only called by CNetAddr::UnserializeV1Stream()
and is a wrapper for CNetAddr::SetLegacyIPv6().

and is a wrapper for CNetAddr::SetLegacyIPv6().
